App for Drivers!

For most of us living in Metro cities, having a Private Driver sometimes seems necessary.

Some days, even if you have to travel only a few kilometres, the roads are always so jam-packed that even a half-hour drive takes a minimum of an hour and a half.

Especially in the peak morning and evening, managing a bumper-to-bumper drive takes away all your energy and keeps you away from some of the essential things you might have done if you had a driver.

How much does a Driver cost in 2024? What is the right monthly salary or charge for hiring a Driver in 2024?

The monthly cost of hiring a Driver in 2024 varies between ₹17,000 and ₹18,000, depending on the car to drive and whether it is for a private or commercial vehicle.

In some cases, the cost of a Driver goes as high as ₹22,000 to ₹25,000, especially if he’s driving an automatic luxury car or if he’s driving the car for an Expat.

(SOURCE – SalaryTracker)

Do you want to check the cost of Drivers near your location in 2024? Try SalaryTracker. It is a free salary tracking tool for 100+ profiles of Workers near you.

It is quite a task when you must drive your car all day and by yourself.

Here are some of the challenges that you face every day if you are driving yourself:

  • Where should you park your car when attending multiple meetings at different locations? A parking ticket is less of an issue. The concern always is finding a decent space.
  • Driving through the crowded roads, more so at peak times, especially when crossing the city’s central hub.
  • Managing bumper-to-bumper drive every day, morning & evening.
  • Safety of valuables like office laptops, mobile phones or shades when you park your car at some corner, where you had to, just because you were running short of time for the meeting
  • A minimum of 1-2 hrs of drive time every day, no matter which city you live in

These are just some of the multiple challenges that many of us face.

Having a permanent & private driver solves most of the issues:

  • No waiting time – You leave your car anywhere & hop on it somewhere, all because now you have a Driver on call
  • Finding a parking space is no longer a concern. You also save on the parking ticket!
  • Driving through the crowded roads all through the day seems easy.
  • And the best part is that you get to either work, take essential calls or relax during those 1-2 hours of drive time.

By having a private driver, all your challenges go away.

However, there’s still one big challenge.

How to find a Private Driver?

There aren’t many options available when you need a permanent & private Driver for yourself.

Your first thought is to ask your friend, neighbour, nearest security guard or people working at your place.

Sure, you can find a Driver by this approach. However, it would take at least a week or a few weeks to find one.

Your second approach is finding a Driver online or looking for an app for a driver.

You may find a few options here through your app for drivers.

But the usual options you may come across are those where you get a Driver for the day or a few hours, where you pay them hourly.

However, this option doesn’t work out all the time.

If you own a car, your need for a driver is not hourly, but for the one who can work for you permanently.

Meet Helpers Near Me.

It is the best app for drivers looking for a private driver.
